title: Wood burning Fireplaces, Minutes from Buckley Air Force Base
posting_body: ['"in the Middle of It All"', 'The Preserve at City Center puts you in the center of it all.', 'If you are searching for an apartment for rent in the Denver Metro area, look no further than our community of attractive, newly remodeled homes.', "The Preserve at City Center is perfectly located in Aurora just off I-225 and Mississippi Avenue, a few blocks away from Town Center at Aurora, Buckley Air Force Base, Children's Hospital and minutes to Downtown Denver, DTC and DIA.", 'Discover the perks of a great location , from a range of entertainment options to a variety of delicious dining spots just a perfect mix of active outdoor recreation and an urban lifestyle.', 'The Preserve at City Center gives you convenient access to everywhere you need to be!', "You'll find a complete selection of shops, grocery stores, services and dining within minutes.", 'Several schools are nearby to serve those residents with families and easy access to RTD bus lines connecting you directly to the Park n Ride or Denver light rail stations.', 'If you are looking for apartments for rent, make The Preserve at City Center your new home.', 'Situated within this park-like setting you will find four different floor plans to choose from consisting of one and two bedroom apartment homes.', 'The Preserve at City Center is a comfortable community with a full range of newly renovated apartment homes which feature faux wood flooring , well-equipped modern kitchens with black or stainless appliances and designer light fixtures and faucets.', "Residents are steps away from the swimming pool, 24 hour fitness center, parks and bike trails making it an ideal retreat to enjoy life's simple pleasures.", 'Come home to quiet, carefree living at The Preserve at City Center Apartment Homes.', 'The Preserve at City Center welcomes your pets with a small deposit.', 'Please note some breed restrictions apply.', 'We invite you to visit our community or to view photos and floor plans of our community.', 'Contact us to schedule your personal tour today!', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 11', 'OR Text', '11', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our leasing team.', 'Visit This Website to See More:', '<URL>', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 836 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Over the range Microwaves included!', '- Washer & Dryer Included', '- Island Kitchens*', '- Wood burning Fireplaces', '- Granite-like Counter Tops', '- Distinctive Paint Scheme/Accent Colors', '- Built-in Shelves*', '- Wood Style Flooring', '- Duel Patios*', '- Bay Windows*', '- Additional Storage*', '- Walk in Closets', '- Black or Stainless Appliances*', '*In Select Apartments', 'Community Amenities', '- 24 Hour Fitness Center', '- Conveniently located between DTC and Downtown Denver', '- Easy access to DIA', '- Easy Access to RTD, Parks, and Trails', '- Minutes from Buckley Air Force Base', '- Sparkling Pool', '- Energizing Espresso Cafe', '- Walking distance to Cafes, Restaurants, and more', 'Pet Policy', 'Limit 2 Per Home', 'Breed Restrictions Apply', 'Office Hours', 'Mon-', 'Fri 9-6:00', 'Saturday 10-5:00', 'Sunday Closed', 'The Preserve at City Center', '1098 S Evanston Way, Aurora, CO, 80012', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'E1jVY2LYm6T']
